name: Linkgilder
overview:
Linkgilder enables private internet users to earn money with affiliate marketing. A lot of private internet users share and recommend interesting products and services with their friends and others by sending them links. If the link is an affiliate link, the online shops pay commissions for a successful recommendation to the people who shared the link. Usually the commission is between 5 and 15 per cent of the purchase price. Most people are overstrained by generating an affiliate link. Hence, almost none product recommendations of private internet users get compensated.

Linkgilder is changing that. The Linkgilder app transforms each link automatically in an affiliate link as soon as the user copies it. The app runs from the user unnoticed in the background. It recognizes if the copied link is a link to a Linkgilder partner shop and transforms the link in this case only. At the moment, Linkgilder cooperates with over 20,000 partners worldwide. Including companies like Macy’s, Zappos, Apple Itunes, Best Buy, HP and many more. The partner network will be increased step by step.

The Linkgilder App is free. Linkgilder only charges a service fee of 30% of the commissions.

video_embeds.description: Earn money by sharing links: That’s how it works
